articles.title: Meeting Held in Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Meeting Held in Mt. Paektu
						
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting to vow loyalty took place in front of the secret camp in Mt. Paektu on Saturday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending the meeting were Kim Yong Chun, Ju Sang Song, Kim Jong Gak, Choe Ryong Hae and Kim Phyong Hae, leading officials of the Party, armed forces, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and people from all walks of life.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, said that the army and people of the DPRK could make a steady advance to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, blessed with the illustrious leaders, under the leadership of Kim Jong Il who was born in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 General of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Gak, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, underlined the need for the KPA to successfully carry forward the noble tradition in which it devotedly defended the WPK and the leader with arms, holding aloft the slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by the great Comrade Kim Jong Il!" as the signpost of conviction and banner of life and struggle.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, stressed the need for all the young people to become Songun revolutionary fighters who remain true to the leadership of the WPK, cherishing the fixed faith that it is possible to achieve the prosperity of Kim Il Sung's nation and carve out a rosy future of Songun Korea when they deeply trust and follow Kim Jong Il only. 
					
					 Fireworks celebrating the February holiday were displayed in the sky above the secret camp and the participants' loud shouts of "hurrah!" resounded through the mountain.

articles.title: Documentary Film Screened
articles.content:
Documentary Film Screened
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Documentary "The Brilliant History of Great Leadership" was screened at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The film comprehensively deals with the undying feats the leader performed for the country and the people, the times and history with his distinguished idea and gigantic practice. 
					
					 It shows the history of revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il, who started the cause of perpetuating the memory of President Kim Il Sung, defended the destiny of the country and the nation with his original Songun politics and brought about the great heyday of prosperity in the country.
					
					 The film also shows the painstaking efforts paid by the leader to national reunification and the cause of global independence and the looks of the Korean army and people closely rallied around him in an ideological and moral manner.
					
					 Watching the film were senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in the city of Pyongyang.

articles.title: Ice Sculpture Festival Held
articles.content:
Ice Sculpture Festival Held
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- An ice sculpture festival started in Samjiyon County at the foot of Mt. Paektu in northern part of the DPRK on Friday in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Hundreds of ice sculptures of 42 shapes are on display around the county cultural hall and the shore of Lake Samji. They were created by members of the Ministry of People's Security group under the 618 Construction Shock Brigade and inhabitants in the county.
					
					 Among them are shapes of floral basket, celebrating lantern, large vase, iron falls which show the achievement made in the production of Juche iron, the dam of the Huichon Power Station.
					
					 They also include a tiger of Mt. Paektu and char in globe.

articles.title: Preparations for Kimjongilia Festival Brisk
articles.content:
Preparations for Kimjongilia Festival Brisk
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The 15th Kimjongilia Festival is due to take place here on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 In this connection Pae Min Ok, 63, director of the Korean Kimilsungia-Kimjongila Committee, was interviewed by KCNA.
					
					 Asked about the theme and scope of the festival, she said:
					
					 The theme of the festival is "February in which Kimjongilias are in full bloom is the spring for all people to sing praises of the leader."
					
					 To be displayed in the festival are potted Kimjongilias presented by armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions, the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, diplomatic missions of different countries and missions of international organizations here, organizations for friendship and solidarity with the DPRK, more than 80 units in all, soldiers, people from all walks of life, school youth and children, overseas Koreans and foreigners.
					
					 The festival will take place at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition on the bank of the River Taedong from Feb. 14 to 21.
					
					 Asked about how preparations for the festival are going on with its opening just a few days off, she answered: 
					
					 Large electronic displays have been set up on either side of the exhibition hall and the distribution of display stands is near completion according to the layout of the venue.
					
					 There will be a number of changes in the distribution of decorative lights and lighting to add to the festivity. 
					
					 Utmost sincerity is being shown by all units and participants to display Kimjongilias, the most beautiful, immortal flowers.

articles.title: Foreign Figure Skaters Here
articles.content:
Foreign Figure Skaters Here
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Figure skaters of Russia, France and the Czech Republic arrived here on Saturday to attend the 20th Paektusan Prize International Figure-skating Festival to be held in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on Feb. 9 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Aleksei Borodavkin, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Russia, deputies to the State Duma, members of the Federation Council and officials of the "United Russia" Party and other officials of the government, political parties, organizations and organs of Russia.
					
					 Kim Yong Jae, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and staff members of his embassy in Moscow were on hand.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length painting of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them before going round photos on display.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.
					
					 The ambassador said that the birth of Kim Jong Il was a historic event which carved out the destiny of the country and the nation and guaranteed a bright future of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He recalled that Kim Jong Il has led the revolution and construction to victory for a long period.
					
					 Expressing the hope that tangible achievements would be made in the development of the DPRK-Russia relations this year, he expressed the expectation that the Russian people would register greater successes in the work to increase the defense capability and achieve the country's economic development and social stability.
					
					 Borodavkin said that the agreement reached between the top leaders of Russia and the DPRK is in line with the interests of the two peoples and contributes to ensuring peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					
					 He hoped that the DPRK would achieve successes in the efforts to improve the people's standard of living and in all fields of the socio-economic development, wishing the Korean people prosperity and wellbeing under the leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 A similar reception was given at the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka on Feb. 1.

articles.title: Russians Visit DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Russians Visit DPRK Missions
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Russian personages visited the DPRK embassy in Moscow and the consulate general in Nakhodka on Jan. 25 and Feb. 9 in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 They were the manager and leading members of the State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company, the second secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the chairman of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Songun Policy.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the full-length portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Gift from Russian Organization
articles.content:
Gift from Russian Organization
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia on the occasion of his birthday.
					 It was handed to Kim Yong Jae, DPRK ambassador to Russia, on Feb. 9 by Manager of the Company Elena Scherbakova.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers and broadcasting services carried special write-ups or aired special programs on Feb. 1 and 2 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The newspaper La Prosperite of Democratic Congo carried a photo of him standing on the tribune of honor of the military parade celebrating the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. It carried the headline "The DPRK celebrates birthday of leader Kim Jong Il revered by the people" under which several articles were edited. 
					
					 The articles said that the Korean people are celebrating February 16 every year as the greatest holiday of the nation, a clear proof of how deeply he is revered by the people.
					
					 The Cambodian newspaper Pracheachon carried a photograph of him acknowledging the cheers of the masses and an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il and his birthday." 
					
					 The Apsara TV and Radio Broadcasting of Cambodia gave a detailed account of the facts that he has considered the people as a teacher and most almighty being. 
					
					 The Nigerian newspaper New Nigerian carried an article praising him for devoting even his birthday to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 On Feb. 5 and 6 the news agencies of Cambodia and Laos released commemorative reports and their broadcasting services aired special programs on the occasion.

articles.title: History of Kim Jong Il Posted on Internet by Finnish Organization
articles.content:
History of Kim Jong Il Posted on Internet by Finnish Organization
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its internet homepage on February 5 the brief history of the revolutionary activities of  General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birthday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Finland, Democratic Congo and Indonesia between Feb. 4 and 7 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, praised Kim Jong Il for developing the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power with his original Songun politics and pursuing the politics of love for the people.
					
					 Kanga Ngerien Jerom, chairman of the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo, said that Kim Jong Il has made the most correct clarifications of the urgent issues arising in every period of the revolution through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 The scope of his ideological and theoretical activities covers all the fields including politics, military affairs, economy and culture, he noted.
					
					 Baharudin Basir, director of the P.T. Dwi Mitra Perkasa Co., praised Kim Jong Il as an outstanding statesman who has victoriously advanced the socialist cause in the DPRK and put the dignity and the might of the country on the highest level with his distinguished political caliber and extraordinary leadership art.

articles.title: rthday of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Birthday of Kim Jong Il Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups on the occasion of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					 The first issue of "Korean Information," the magazine of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, carried a portrait of Kim Jong Il together with an article titled "Encouraging Leader." 
					
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea was an expression of the Korean people's trust in him who united the people with his energetic leadership and greatly contributed to the struggle for accomplishing the socialist cause, achieving peace and security and defusing tension on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 It was by no means fortuitous that many politicians and state leaders of the West were fascinated by Kim Jong Il's personality when they were received by him, it stressed.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its internet homepage on February 5 a photo of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and an article dealing with the warm praises made by south Korean people and other progressive people of the world of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The homepage cited facts that the world progressive people are expressing boundless respect and reverence for him. 
					
					 February 16 is the only holiday common to humankind most significantly celebrated worldwide irrespective of race, language, system and ideology, the homepage said, adding that the world progressives are highly lauding him as a universally recognized great statesman and the most prominent leader in the 21st century.

articles.title: Talks Held between Korean, Finnish Party Delegations
articles.content:
Talks Held between Korean, Finnish Party Delegations
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Talks were held here on Saturday between the delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Finnish Communists' League.
					 Present there from the WPK side were Kim Yong Il, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and officials concerned and from the opposite side the delegation of the FCL led by Chairman Kalevi Wahrman. 
					
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of their party activities and exchanged views on the matter of further developing the relations between the two parties and issues of common concern.

articles.title: Finnish Delegation Feted
articles.content:
Finnish Delegation Feted
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) hosted a reception at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel Saturday in honor of the delegation of the Finnish Communists' League (FCL) on a visit to the DPRK.
					 Present there on invitation was the delegation led by Chairman Kalevi Wahrman.
					
					 On hand were Kim Yong Il, secretary of the C.C., the WPK and its officials.
					
					 Kim Yong Il thanked the FCL for having actively supported the WPK and the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the independent reunification of the country.
					
					 The WPK will work hard to boost the relations between the two parties in the future, too, he added.
					
					  Kalevi Wahrman said that the achievements made by the Korean people in socialist construction under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il are greatly encouraging the FCL.
					
					 The FCL will in the future, too, work hard to boost the relations with the WPK, he stressed.

articles.title: Finnish Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Finnish Delegation Arrives
						
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Finnish Communists' League led by Chairman Kalevi Wahrman arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates President of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates President of Equatorial Guinea
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a congratulatory message to Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, President of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea, on Friday on his election as chairman of the AU.
					 The government and people of the DPRK appreciate that the 16th Ordinary Session of the Assembly of Heads of State and Government of the AU marked an important occasion in achieving the peace, security, great unity and integration of the region by the concerted efforts of Africans, the message said.
					
					 It reaffirmed the will to invariably boost the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with the AU and its member states. 
					
					It hoped that the AU would register success in its future work to achieve the security and political and economic integration of the continent through the unity of its member states thanks to the positive role of the President.

articles.title: Mines Alive with Drive for Great Surge
articles.content:
Mines Alive with Drive for Great Surge
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A high-pitched drive for a great surge is now under way at the mines in the Komdok area of the DPRK.
					 The Komdok Mining Complex carried out its January national economy plan at 100.2 percent and is now making uninterrupted innovations in February, too.
					
					The Namphung Mine and other mines are introducing advanced mining methods after concentrating up-to-date equipment on large mining sites.
					
					 The Ryongyang Mine built more than ten new large mining sites. It worked out a scientific business strategy and is now successfully implementing it, trebling ore storing and processing capacity as compared with that in the past. 
					
					 The Magnesia Clinker Branch Factory of the Taehung Youth Hero Mine developed a rational calcination method and successfully ensured the balance between the feeding of raw materials and fuel and their ejection, improving the quality of magnesia clinker and light burned magnesia.
					
					 The Paekbawi Mine is boosting the production of ores rich in content everyday by combining well open-cast mining with pit mining and increasing the speed of crushing.

articles.title: People Feel Thankful to Kim Jong Il for His Total Dedication
articles.content:
People Feel Thankful to Kim Jong Il for His Total Dedication
Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Korean people feel deeply thankful to General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has made ceaseless journeys of his devoted service for the improvement of the people's standard of living since the outset of the year with his birthday drawing closer.
					 He visited the Nampho Glass Bottle Factory, the Ryongaksan Spring Water Factory, foodstuff factories in Sariwon City and many other industrial establishments in January alone despite the bitterest cold in the last more than six decades.
					
					 In December last year, too, he provided field guidance to light industrial establishments and catering centers in the capital city of Pyongyang and at least 30 units in Hamhung, Musan, Hoeryong, Chongjin and others across the country.
					
					 When seeing a product, he, to begin with, asked officials if people liked it. He also asked in detail if it would be substantially helpful to people's living.
					
					 He is busy with his forced march for devoted service, making the people centre of all his thinking and activities. This is ushering in an era of prosperity in which all their ideals are becoming realities on this land.
					
					 It was thanks to his dynamic leadership that last year witnessed such great events as the mass-production of vinalon and Juche-based fertilizers, the appearance of vast young orchards and the Specialist Restaurant under the Okryu Restaurant.
					
					 He is, indeed, the great leader and the father of the people, who unfolded a grandiose plan to enable the Korean people to enjoy greater happiness and is translating it into reality.

articles.title: S. Korea Denounced for Sticking to Their Policy of Confrontation
articles.content:
S. Korea Denounced for Sticking to Their Policy of Confrontation 
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The preliminary talks for the opening of the north-south high-level military talks clearly showed the intention of the south Korean authorities to stick to their policy of confrontation with the DPRK, opposed to inter-Korean dialogue and negotiations and the improvement of the north-south relations. Major newspapers Saturday observe this in their bylined commentaries. 
					 The south side behaved very crudely, betraying its sinister intention to scuttle the north-south talks at any cost far from showing any stance to open them, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities were not ready to hold dialogue with the north from the outset. 
					
					 They only tried to use the talks as a platform for imputing responsibility for the warship "Cheonan" sinking incident and the Yonphyong Island shelling to the north. 
					
					 At the preliminary talks they tried hard to justify their unreasonable demand, talking about "the sentiment of the people". This was preposterous, indeed. 
					
					 It admits of no argument that the south side came out to the conference room not to improve the north-south relations through dialogue but to cover up its true colors as confrontation maniacs and mislead public opinion at home and abroad. 
					
					 The developments go to prove that it is impossible to improve the north-south relations and the situation on the Korean Peninsula will lead to a more dangerous phase unless the south Korean authorities give up their attitude of denying dialogue and seeking confrontation as now.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the attempt of the south Korean authorities to shift the responsibility for the collapse of the talks onto the other is to escape the domestic and foreign public criticism of them and further bedevil the north-south relations and thus escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen in collusion with outside forces.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Songun Politics
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Songun Politics
						
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Songun politics serves as a treasured sword for defending the nation and peace. This helps foil foreign aggression and war moves, protect the destiny and security of the nation and achieve durable peace and peaceful reunification of the country with invincible arms.
					 Rodong Sinmun, a major newspaper of the DPRK, Saturday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 It is thanks to the invincible Songun politics in the DPRK that a war has been averted on the Korean Peninsula and provokers failed to launch aggression over the last more than six decades, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Koreans' desire and wishes to achieve independent reunification and peace and prosperity can come true only thanks to the Songun politics being praised as a patriotic one and demonstrating its might as a reliable shield for protecting the nation.
					
					 The sovereign right of the nation can never be protected by mere talking or appeal as long as aggression forces are allowed to seek world supremacy. Sovereignty which keeps the nation alive and the safety and happiness of Koreans would be unthinkable without the Songun politics in the DPRK.
					
					 It has displayed its invincible might as a great banner for national reunification and prosperity in the past.
					
					 The historic June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration were adopted to imbue all the Koreans with hope for reunification and shake the world and dynamic actions are now under way to achieve national reconciliation, unity and independent reunification. This reality today would be unimaginable without the great Songun politics which reliably protects peace on the Korean Peninsula and creates an environment favorable for independent reunification.
					
					 The Songun politics is symbolic of dignity and pride of the Korean nation as it ushered in a shining era of independent reunification in the history of the Korean nation and provides a sure guarantee for its triumphant advance.

articles.title: Nepalese Organizations for Study of Juche Idea Meet
articles.content:
Nepalese Organizations for Study of Juche Idea Meet
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, the Nepal Women's Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Nepal Institute for the Juche Studies at their annual meetings held on Jan. 31 and Feb. 1 discussed the issues of organizing various political and cultural events in the run-up to the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung which will fall in 2012. 
					 The meetings reviewed the activities conducted by them last year and discussed their plans to intensify the study and dissemination of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Russian Organization for Study of Juche and Songun Idea Formed
articles.content:
Russian Organization for Study of Juche and Songun Idea Formed
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Khomsk City Association for the Study of Juche Idea and Songun Idea of Russia was formed on Jan. 29.
					 Soba Andrei Nikolaevich was elected its chairman.

articles.title: Juche Idea Praised by Regional Study Organization
articles.content:
Juche Idea Praised by Regional Study Organization
 Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted an article titled "Juche Idea and National Issue" on its Internet homepage on Feb. 5.
					 The Juche idea clarifies the essence of the nation's issue, the focus of the world political issue and an important topic of discussion, and ways for solving it, the article said, adding:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung clarified that the nation's issue is, in essence, an issue of defending and realizing the independence of the nation.
					
					 The sovereignty of the nation is the most important factor of eradicating all forms of subjugation and inequality and hewing out one's destiny by one's own efforts.
					
					 Only when one defends and achieves the sovereignty of one's nation, can one protect the rights and interests of the nation, hew out one's destiny in conformity with the will and requirements of the nation, legitimately exercise the sovereignty in the international arena and develop external relations on the principle of complete equality and mutual benefit.
					
					 The Juche idea serves the only guidelines for settling the nation's issue at present as it indicates ways of achieving the sovereignty of the nation.

articles.title: Acto de juramento en campamento secreto del monte Paektu
articles.content:
Acto de juramento en campamento secreto del monte Paektu
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, se efectuo el dia 12 el acto de juramento en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu.
					   En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Chun, Ju Sang Song, Kim Jong Gak, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Phyong Hae, los funcionarios directivos de las instituciones del partido y las fuerzas armadas, las organizaciones de masas, los ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea junto con los trabajadores de distintos sectores.
					
					  En el acto hubo discursos.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC, senalo que gracias al Dirigente Kim Jong Il nacido en el monte Paektu, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea pudieron avanzar firmemente por la unica senda del cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche teniendo la fortuna de contar con excelentes lideres y generales.
					
					El general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, subrayo que el EPC vino defendiendo con armas al PTC y al lider y debe dar firme continuidad a esta tradicion levantando en alto la consigna "!Defendamos a vida o muerte al Comite Central del Partido encabezado por el gran camarada            Kim Jong Il!" como el lema de conviccion y la bandera de vida y lucha.
					
					Ri Yong Chol, primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, asevero que los jovenes deben tener la firme conviccion de que la eterna prosperidad de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y el brillante porvenir de la Corea del Songun estan en el camino de confiar y seguir unicamente al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Exhorto a prepararse como combatientes revolucionarios del Songun que sepan apoyar con fidelidad la direccion del PTC.
					
					Se lanzaron los fuegos artificiales al cielo sobre el campamento secreto del monte Paektu y estremecieron el lugar los estruendosos vitores de los participantes.

articles.title: Conversan en Pyongyang las delegaciones del PTC y LCF
articles.content:
Conversan en Pyongyang las delegaciones del PTC y LCF
  Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 12 en esta capital las conversaciones entre las delegaciones del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y de la Liga de Comunistas de Finlandia. 
					  Estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Yong Il, y otros funcionarios, y por la finlandesa, los integrantes de la delegacion de la LCF encabezada por el presidente Kalevi Wahrman. 
					
					  Ambas partes informaron las actividades de respectivos partidos e intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el mayor desarrollo de las relaciones bilaterales y otros problemas de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de entidad artistica de Rusia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de entidad artistica de Rusia
  Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ATCC) --  El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que con motivo de su cumpleanos (16 de febrero) le dedicara el Conjunto de Danza Folclorica Academica Nacional Igor Moiseyev de Rusia.
					  La directora del conjunto, Elena Scherbakova, lo entrego el dia 9 al embajador coreano en su pais, Kim Yong Jae.

articles.title: Periodicos denuncian la actitud de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Periodicos denuncian la actitud de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ATCC) -- En sendos comentarios individuales difundidos este sabado, los periodicos capitalinos senalaron que a traves del dialogo previo para la apertura de las conversaciones militares de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea, se ha comprobado claramente la actitud de las autoridades surcoreanas de mantener hasta el final su politica conflictiva con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea rechazando el dialogo, las negociaciones y el mejoramiento de relaciones con esta.
					La parte Sur actuo con bajeza en esa ocasion exponiendo su malvada intencion de frustrar a toda costa el dialogo con el Norte, senala el diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					Desde el principio, las autoridades surcoreanas no estaban para el dialogo.
					
					Ellas pretendieron usar el dialogo previo como espacio para imputar oficialmente a la parte Norte la responsabilidad del incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" y el de canonazos en la isla Yonphyong.
					
					Ademas, los gobernantes surcoreanos trataron de justificar sus injustas demandas alegando absurdamente el "sentimiento del pueblo".
					
					Es indiscutible que la parte surena acudio a la mesa de ese dialogo no para conversar o mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas sino enganar a la opinion publica interna y externa ocultando su genio conflictivo.
					
					La situacion de hoy muestra que si las autoridades surcoreanas no abandonan su actitud negativa al dialogo y la conflictiva de ahora, no seran mejoradas las relaciones intercoreanas, por el contrario, la Peninsula Coreana correra el peligro mas grande.
					
					A su vez, el periodico Minju Joson senalo que las autoridades surcoreanas intentan imputar a la contraparte la responsabilidad de la ruptura de las conversaciones con el objetivo de esquivar la critica de la opinion publica interna y externa tergiversando los hechos, empeorar de continuo las relaciones con el Norte y endurecer la campana de confrontacion fratricida en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras.

articles.title: Medios de prensa de varios paises elogian a Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Medios de prensa de varios paises elogian a Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 12 de febrero (ATCC) -- Los periodicos y radios de varios paises hicieron los dias 1 y 2 ediciones y transmisiones especiales por el dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					El periodico del Congo Democratico La Prosperite publico varios articulos bajo el titulo de "La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea celebra el dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il venerado por el pueblo" adjuntando la foto de el parado en la tribuna del desfile militar en homenaje al 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					El periodico destaco en esos articulos que el pueblo coreano conmemora cada ano el 16 de febrero como maxima fiesta nacional, lo cual es un buen ejemplo de la gran veneracion al Dirigente.
					
					El periodico camboyano Pracheachon publico el articulo intitulado "Dirigente Kim Jong Il y su cumpleanos" junto con la foto del Dirigente respondiendo a la aclamacion de los habitantes.
					
					La cadena de TV y radio Apsara de Camboya dio a conocer en detalles que el Dirigente considera al pueblo como maestro y ente todopoderoso.
					
					El periodico nigeriano New Nigerian hizo publico el articulo encomiando al Dirigente que trabaja hasta en el dia de su cumpleanos por la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Por otra parte, las agencias noticieras y las radioemisoras de Camboya y Laos hicieron otro tanto los dias 5 y 6.
